column1: #Text=Scores killed in twin Baghdad marketplace attacks
#Text=Friday , twin attacks in Iraq killed at least 72 people and wounded another 149 .
#Text=Separated by twenty minutes , the bombings targeted two marketplaces in Baghdad shortly before the call to Friday prayers .
#Text=These attacks were unlike suicide bombings in that the bombs were dynamite and ball bearings strapped to two women .
#Text=These human bombs were then detonated remotely using mobile phone .
#Text=The identities of the women have not been released .
#Text=Major-General Qassim Moussawi , spokesman for the Iraqi military in Baghdad said , " The operation was carried out by two booby-trapped mentally disabled women .

#Text= Most people who visit this market are poor and just want to enjoy themselves but they came and got killed , " said Hassan Salman , who sells bird seed at the Ghazl market .

column1: #Text=The attacks are the deadliest in Iraq since the al-Khilani Mosque bombing which killed 87 people on June 19 , 2007 .
